text: Dominik Cristina García-Lorido (born August 16, 1983) is an American actress. She is known for her roles in The Lost City as Mercedes Fellove and City Island as Vivian Rizzo. Her father is actor Andy García.Double Take : Dominik Garcia – LoridoAndy Garcia Biography (1956-) She also had a role in the television series Magic City. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Miami
title: Dominik García-Lorido
